NotTalkToCry: ^None of my business, I'll leave her be.
TalkCryGirl: ^...Oh-sorry, I just-I didn't see you there.
^I know it's not my business but did something happen? You seem to be crying a lot.
DeflectQuestion: ^Oh...heh, yeah I just - wiping tears from eyes - I'm always such a screw-up at everything...with work, friends...even with the love of my life...
^I screwed it all up, it seems to be the only stupid thing I'm good for.
^No one is a complete screw up ya know, there must be something you enjoy right?
StartGoodConvo: ^Yeah, things you do in your pass-time for fun.
HobbyTalk: ^Well...I like playing videogames and gardening...reading in the park is fun too.
AskingHobbies1: ^What kind of videogames do you play?
^What kinds of plants have you grown?
^What sorts of books do you read?
AskingGaming: ^I like to play first person shooters, Boom Killer is my favourite but I also like fantasy RPGs like the Legend of Lunk: Wind of the Outback.
^I personally prefer games like Monster Seeker
GettingAlong: ^Oh yeah, that's a good one too -smiles-
EveryoneOppinionMean: ^Everyone has their own oppinion, it's just something I enjoy
AskingHobbies2: ^What kind of videogames do you play?
^What sorts of books do you read?
AskGardening: ^Oh not too many, just a few house plants, it's a more recent hobby I got into. Last week I managed to make it to 5 weeks without accidentally forgetting to water them.
^It's not much but I'm making progress at least - she laughs to herself -
^Even small progress is still progress, it's something to be proud of
^Be careful not watering plants, I've heard their behaviour can get pretty unbeleafable
^I think the plants would expect you to do better
GardeningMean: ^Hey, I did say it was a recent hobby, I'm still learning
FunnyBadJoke: ^Laughing - Okay that was funny but it's still bad.
Appreciative: ^Her laughing dies down - Sorry, I appreciate it
AskReading: ^I've been really getting into the Five days at Benny's series lately, I love the mystery involved in it and the scary factor of it gives me goosebumps...but like in a good way ya know?
^Wait you like it too? I thought it was just me, small world
Spooked: ^Well I suppose it's not for everyone, that's why people have made so many different genres to choose from
NicetomeetFan: ^It's nice to meet another fan of the series
DoneAskingHobbies: ^Thanks for helping me calm down...I'm Cathy by the way, what about you?
SmileCathy: ^I really appreciate your help but...I feel like I'm still at square one. I'm no longer drinking my sorrows but I don't know where to go from here.
QuestionCathy: ^I was once engaged to the love of my life but when it came to making the big decisions, I always hesitated, even the small decisions.
^They were the one always making the first move, always having to make the decisions for me cause I could never make up my mind.
^I was never sure of what I wanted, I felt like there was never enough time to make risky decisions so I never made them, I stayed stagnant in my mind waiting for the decisions to be made for me...
^But you can't exactly do that when it's your turn to say "I do" can you?
ContinueStory: ^I broke their heart and in turn broke my own. My family, my friends, they won't even talk to me and my coworkers? They treat me like crap for messing things up as I always did.
^I mean sure, I could go move countries and change my name but what would I do after that?
^I'm scared of overthinking every little thing and not being able to live my life, just being stuck in this endless loop.
^Sorry I don't know how to help you with that
Dissapoint: ^That's alright, sorry it's not your problem to solve. I'm sure the answer will come to me eventually.
^Actually, I think I might know of something you can do.
ExplainAdvice: ^Well we're human beings, being afraid of the consequences of a bad decision is completely normal, we don't live forever so we don't wanna mess up. But if you never take any chances, you'll never get to experience what life truely has to offer. Maybe take up a job that requires you to do more decision making so you can get used to it.
NeverThought: ^I guess you're right, yeah. I think I'll give that a try, thanks Matt.
^No problem, I should head off soon. It was nice chatting with you
DillonCatchesYa: ^Yo Matt, I was wondering where you got off to.
^Woa easy there bud, you're not looking so good... I think it's time to go home.
Yeesh: ^Take it easy Matt, deep breaths. The car's not too far away.
HeDefNotFine: ^What do you mean "fine"? You can barely keep yourself standing.
^You're not my dad, you can't tell me what to do
CarryBoi: ^He picks up a drunk Matt and carries him over his shoulders-
^There we go. The car isn't too far, you'll be alright.
Attaboy: ^Atta boy, come here -He puts his arm over Matt's shoulder to lean against-
